interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Unbroken: Path to Redemption
Review Date: 2018/12/19
Categories: Drama, Compelling, Emotional, Tense
Product Description: ["Beginning where the hit movie Unbroken concludes, the next chapter brings the rest of Louis Zamperini's inspirational true story to life."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Harold Cronk'], 'Producers': ['Matthew Baer', 'Mike Elliott'], 'Starring': ['Samuel Hunt', 'Merritt Patterson', 'Vincenzo Amato']}
Review Text: This movie is amazing! Dude to diferent kind of child hood abuses  n having a big trigger as an adult I also had ptsd! Once I started to hear preachers on how important it is to be fill with Gods spirit, and to renew my mind my focusing on him not on my pain , so i started to focus on  Jesus and Jesus heal me! I used to go all around college crying.  Many people use to stop me and ask me what was wrong. I used to lied and said I had a bad case of sinuses! NOw i go around college, telling people my testimony and a healing Christian program call celebrate recovery!  this is a must watch story!
Review Title: WOW!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Way We Were, The
Drama, Passionate, Sad, Sentimental
['Set during the politically charged time of pre-WWII McCarthyism, a young couple with diametrically opposing views of politics, friendships and careers find it difficult to balance their private love and desires with their very public lives.']
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Pollack', 'Sydney'], 'Producers': ['Ray Stark'], 'Starring': ['Barbra Streisand', 'Robert Redford', 'Bradford Dillman']}
Most movies have happy endings. The ending is not horible but its not a good one. I wish the main character would had fought for his wife, specialy because it is because of her that he got to the top! Never even notice him being depress or ask for a second opportunity or do anything to save the marriage. It broke my heart!
Upset! No happy ending to an amazong movie!
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Radha Bharadwaj'], 'Producers': ['Radha Bharadwaj', 'Gregory Cascante', 'Mike Cline', 'Christian Slater'], 'Starring': ['Jared Leto', 'Christian Slater', 'Claire Forlani'], 'Studio': ['Multicom Entertainment Group (MEG)']}
The only reason why i gave this movie a 4 n not a  5 star is because basil didnt mary clara at the end.
Amazing movie.
The Song
Drama, Romance, Inspiring, Mystical
['An aspiring singer-songwriter is struggling to catch a break and escape the long shadow of his famous father until he writes a love song that catapults him to stardom.']
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Ramsey'], 'Producers': ['Shane Sooter', 'Cassandra Pelan'], 'Starring': ['Ali Faulkner', 'Alan Powell', 'Caitlin Nicol-Thomas']}
I love the lessons this movie teaches! Most humans are just worried about providing, they forget to protect the most important things Love (God) and family!!!!!!
Sooo worth it!
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['John Korty'], 'Producers': ['David V. Picker'], 'Starring': ["Ryan O'Neal", 'Candice Bergen', 'Nicola Pagett'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']}
Not enough plot. Is nice to see that oliver at the end realise that he needs to live a living life againg, but theres not a true happy ending of maybe him remarrying n living happely ever after.
Its ok

Just a Little Chemistry
Comedy, Arthouse, Romance, International
['Nineteen year old Oli falls for her TV idol and embarks on a Cinderella-like romance filled with luxury, fame, success and money. It seems she has found her fairy tale ending, until she learns good chemistry and true love are not one and the same.']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user demonstrates a strong preference for emotional and dramatic narratives that delve into complex relationships and societal issues, particularly in historical contexts. However, recent interactions indicate a notable shift towards a more uplifting and simple storytelling style. Their latest high-rated review exemplifies an appreciation for narratives that focus on personal healing, redemption, and spirituality, highlighting the transformative power of faith and community support.

This evolution suggests that while the user continues to enjoy intricate plots, they are increasingly open to stories that provide comfort and inspiration without heavy complexity. They value themes of personal growth, love, and resilience, evidenced by their enthusiastic response to narratives that impart hope and healing. 

The user remains a thoughtful and discerning audience member, now embracing a broader spectrum of storytelling that includes both emotionally charged dramas and uplifting tales. Their profile reflects a balanced enjoyment of narratives that stimulate both mind and heart, suggesting a commitment to impactful storytelling that transcends genres, embodying a mix of depth and lightheartedness. Overall, the user's evolving preferences indicate a readiness to engage with diverse emotional experiences while maintaining an appreciation for the intricate nuances of life’s narratives.
